value:
I'm a pegasus knight, just like my
sisters, Palla and Est.

Macedonian fliers are divided into
the pegasus Whitewings and the
wyvern Dragoons. I'm a Whitewing.

*sigh* Ah! How embarrassing—you
caught me daydreaming!

My sister Palla often says I'm
clever but stubborn... *sigh*
I wonder which one I am today...

I'd better get training. I'm not as
talented as Palla or Est, so I have
to make it up with effort.

I've been sent here on an errand
by $Nf.$k$pYou know, just to say hi!

Times like this are when I really
need to focus.
Slowly but surely...I'm improving.
I hope no one sees me like this!

It's good to see my effort bearing
fruit like this.

I'm Catria, the middle of the three
sisters in Macedon's Whitewings.
I serve Princess Minerva.

Huh. Is that how I seem? Like I'm
always staring off into the
distance?$k$pHeehee! I guess if that's how it
seems, it's probably true, right?$k$pBut I know how to fix it—by
spending more time with you,
developing our...bond.$k$pI know that every day I spend with
you will help me focus and keep me
looking straight ahead.$k$pAs long as I have you by my side,
I can do anything.
はいっ！
せいっ！
きゃああっ！
Ugh... No...
Here I go!
Finishing blow!
This ought to do it!
No matter the cost!
Awwww...
Heehee
Whatever you need, I'll get the job done.
Augh! Er...I mean, what's going on?
I must never bring shame to the Whitewings.
I...I have a lot of respect for you.
Allies help one another.
I know I shouldn't feel this way about...him.
Thank you for having me join you. It means a lot.
Understood.
Easy now...
You got it.
